pvplegacyutils.title: PvP Legacy Utils config menu
pvplegacyutils.stats.rightClick: Right-click for stats of a player
pvplegacyutils.stats.middleClick.tooltip: Internally uses the Pick Block functionality,
Make sure you have Pick Block bound to a key.
pvplegacyutils.ping.duel: Notify when someone invites you to a duel
pvplegacyutils.ping.invite: Notify when someone invites you to a party
pvplegacyutils.ping.tenVSTen: Notify when a ?v? game is starting
pvplegacyutils.ping.godGame: Notify when a God Game is starting
pvplegacyutils.leave.explicit.tooltip.4: You can still do it by
pvplegacyutils.leave.explicit.tooltip.6: to check a kit of a sign,
pvplegacyutils.leave.explicit.tooltip.7: or to re-queue in another sign.
pvplegacyutils.leave.leftClick: Left-click on a sign to leave a queue
pvplegacyutils.autogg.startGame: Auto-say at the start of games
pvplegacyutils.autogg.startGame.text: Text to send at the start of games

pvplegacyutils.autogg.startRound.text: Text to send at the start of rounds
pvplegacyutils.autogg.endRound: Auto-say at the end of rounds?
pvplegacyutils.autogg.endRound.tooltip.1: If "Auto-say at the end of games"
pvplegacyutils.autogg.endRound.tooltip.2: is disabled, this will be said
pvplegacyutils.autogg.endRound.tooltip.3: at the end of games too.
pvplegacyutils.autogg.endRound.text: Text to send at the end of rounds
pvplegacyutils.autogg.endGame: Auto-say at the end of games
pvplegacyutils.autogg.endGame.text: Text to send at the end of games
pvplegacyutils.sortByKills: Sort the player list by kills
